io.github.nullptr.tools.redis.connection

Class RedisConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.nullptr.tools.redis.connection.RedisConnection

  • public class RedisConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    A connection and request manager for the Jedis library.

                       java.lang.String redisHost,
                       int redisPort,
                       java.lang.String redisPass)
        The constructor of the Redis manager.
        Parameters:
        executor - The executor used for asynchronous requests.
        redisHost - The host of the Redis server.
        redisPort - The port of the Redis server.
        redisPass - The password of the Redis server.

        The method that executes a function on the Redis server, and return a result.
        Type Parameters:
        R - The type of the object to return, use Void if you don't want to return anything.

        Returns:
        The object returned by the function.

      • executeAsync

        public <R> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<R> executeAsync(java.util.function.Function<redis.clients.jedis.Jedis,R> function)
        The method that executes asynchronously a function on the Redis server, and return a result.
        Type Parameters:
        R - The type of the object to return, use Void if you don't want to return anything.
        Parameters:
        function - The function to execute.
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture that will contain the object returned by the function.
